text: The Safe Surrey Coalition is a civic political party in Surrey, British Columbia, Canada. == Members == * Doug McCallum - Current mayor of Surrey * Doug Elford * Steven Pettigrew - left the party * Bableen Rana * Allison Patton * Mandeep Nagra * Brenda Locke - left the party * Jack Handial - left the party * Laurie Guerra == Elections == In the October 2018 Election, Doug McCallum and all councillors, except Bableen Rana was elected. There was also one councillor from Surrey First, it was Linda Annis. == References == Category:Political parties in Canada Category:Surrey, British Columbia Category:Municipal political parties in British Columbia
title: Safe Surrey Coalition
